name: OMRI.
cleanBio: Every breath you take, every move you make in the land of milk & honey the name OMRI. shines out like a diamond. This colorful project is lead by the talented musician, Omri Gueta, who is without doubt one of the loved figures roaming Tel Aviv local scene and a breath of fresh air setting the tone of the vibrant new local generation. Omri is producing independent, original music since his early teens and in the past couple of years took things forward and is pushing things to the next level. OMRI. sound is deep and trippy ad is always part of a tale presenting an angle to his journey and evolution. Aside from running a super busy performance and studio session, OMRI. is part of the developing crew of 'More than friends', Tuesday nights at the awesome Drama Klub!
